name: Fox Bets AI
description: Fox Bets AI is the ultimate fusion of AI, sports betting, and prediction markets. A single platform built for the next generation of sports and Web3 enthusiasts. By combining cutting edge AI insights with decentralized prediction markets, we’re delivering the future of betting today. Fox Bets AI was built to make prediction markets simple, smarter, and more profitable for everyday users. Instead of juggling odds, feeds, and noisy takes, the agent aggregates information, turns it into clear probabilities, and helps you act—via signals now, and automated strategies next.
